2_17H8EGEoNF1z2AXFtXmBQJLHTmh7gMGzzS.body:
Anarchism cannot exist for a long period of time because someone with more power will always take control of someone else. Another solution would be tribalism (what actually existed for millions of years). If we live in tribe (50-150 peoples who knows each others), The problem would be solved. This tribes can have a direct democratic system through discussion (this is possible only at this scale) or have one chief who is well respected for his past actions.
If someone doesn't like his own tribe, he can try to go to another and to be accepted there after he had proven his merit.
